alert.note: Alert for Barber (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 9:25PM CDT until June 17 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Barber County in south central Kansas... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 925 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located very near Kiowa, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hazelton around 945 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for south central Kansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for south central Kansas.
